publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3755 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerkâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, between 4 September 2006 and 3 January 2007, the Office of the Clerk will be open on all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 1 December 2006, 22 December 2006 (pm), 25 and 26 December 2006 and 1 and 2 January 2007. Supported by: George Lyon*
